A bad news,  l lot of harpies appeare in our village. They can speak, walk on two legs like human. Strangely they grasp children without hurting them. I see in your eyes,  the same fear that would take the heart of me. Go to kill them and take three bodies  back. We must find out why and rescue our children.

According to analysis result, we doubt that some evil organization named POMELO grasped children for human experimentation to clone cruel animals. A lot of children have lost. Please kill as many as corpse flowers to stop them continue to grasp children and take five bodies back.

We are right, POMELO  clones monsters with our children. The monsters begain to kill mankind after our last attack and more children have lost. Recently,  many  people have died with the virus spread by unicorn beetles which are new monsters .Hold your ground !Hold your ground!  Kill them and take ten bodies back.

As you all know, POMELO  has cloned thousands of  monsters by our children. Of course, it will continue to do so, and our children will continue to be grasped. You hold dear on this good earth, I bid you stand, Men of the West! Kill the dragonflies !
Kill ten coconut monsters and take them here!
